Comments_List: I learned a lot of math that is used in economics (ie, Evolutionary Game Theory, Fixed Point Theorems, Optimization).
I had an amazing time working with Stefan and am super grateful he agreed to put together this course!
If you have a professor that's willing to set up an independent study with you, you should definitely go for it! It was a super rewarding experience.
